resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

fields.summary: Fix nodemgr native compilation problems on FreeBSD9

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

$ javac -version
javac 1.6.0_32

comments.body:
This was building with -Pnative.

It looks like the nodemanager attempts to use linux Container Groups even on non-linux platforms.

Building without -Pnative shows other issues which I will report separately,
Hello, [~pfg].  There is an uncommitted patch for this issue on YARN-1327, so I'm resolving this as duplicate.
